content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity Generator at Position (-6.625, 20.375)
Consists of the following entities:
- Steam Engine at position (-5.5, 19.5)
- Boiler at position (-2.5, 24.0)
- Offshore Pump at position (-9.5, 24.5)
- Pipe Group at position (-5.5, 16.5)
- Pipe Group at position (-8.5, 23.5)
- Electricity Group at position (-6.625, 20.375)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors when connecting pipes
- Ensure you have enough pipes in your inventory before attempting to connect entities.
- Verify that the entities you are trying to connect are within a valid range and that there are no obstructions.

### Errors due to lack of items in inventory
- Always check your inventory to ensure you have the required items before attempting to place or use them. This includes items like small electric poles and coal.

### Errors when connecting entities to the electric network
- Ensure that all entities requiring electricity are properly connected to the electric network. Check the placement of electric poles and ensure they are within range to connect the necessary entities.
